params._to: : Array of the reward/ aidrop recipients.
params._tokenId: : The ID of the token to be airdropped.

params._baseMetadataURI: : Base Metadata URI for ERC-1155 collection.
params._initialSupplies: : Array of the initial supplies corresponding to the token Id.

params._amount: : Amount of tokens to be minted to msg.sender.
params._tokenId: : The ID of the token to be minted.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

airdropNewTokens(address,uint256,address.notice: Method for Airdropping a single token to those receiving rewards/ airdrops.

createCollection(string,uint256[],uint25.notice: Method for creating an ERC-1555 upgradeable collection.

mintToken(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Method for Minting a specified amount of tokens to msg.sender.
